Understood.
I had such a friend in Philadelphia many years ago. He bound a =
dozen Nihonto books for me.

I hesitated to get the Compton Complete Set fo=
r many years.=C2=A0 Vol 1 is worth it, and probably Vol 2.

Good luck.


Cu=
rran
